name: Milk Man 2: Tha Revenge
description:
milk mna 2: the revenge

This game is a sequel to Milk Man: Shit Edition so . This is basically just that game except the story is different and longer and worse. And also there's good music.

people that helped make the game:

brownfountain (art, game design)
Catalystl (art, game design, music, programming, story)
devin (art, music, voice acting)
Squily (art, game design, story)
Wegra (voice acting kind of)

See who did what art in the game at my site (SPOILER WARNING): soupycartoon.com/milkman2/art.html
